name: Set Start

M2X lead-in
Web Service for Device Registration
info:
Only needed one time over all.  Calling this
service will create a device in M2X along with
the necessary streams.  After its called once,
set the values in the Configuration function
node.

For this to work you'll need to configure the
two M2X nodes to use your M2X configuration,
which consists of simply the M2X master key.

name: Extra New Device Info and Save to Context Variables
info:
This will populate the global context scope
with deviceID and deviceKey for this device.

Watch the Debug panel for these values. They
can also be found in M2X itself.

name: M2X lead-in
Send Sensor Data over HTTP
info:
You will need to copy the endpoint from the
Climate HTTP-IN node in the Data flow (see the
Endpoints tab below) and use it to configure
the Climate HTTP-REQUEST node here.
